content: As Us Core Lab Result Observation.effectiveDateTime is defined as representing the date the Specimen was collected (when applicable), is a lab result's final (result) Date/Time expected to be found in .meta.lastUpdated, going back through history to the version when .status=final? Seems odd there is no timestamp element within Observation for the moment at which the lab observation in asserted/made, and duplicative with a potential to conflict with Specimen.collection dateTime
effective x stays the same as the Observation state progresses.

Us Core Lab Result Observation "Defines constraints and extensions on the Observation resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve laboratory test results" (emphasis mine) but does not prohibit adding other elements like issued
